branchCategory.name: VP*4*-X555, Residual Pressure Release Valve, ISO13849-1
branchCategory.description: <p>Special version of the VP series valve that conforms to ISO13849-1 safety standard, categories 3 and 4. These are a dual residual pressure release valve with detection of main valve position.</p>
